item.title: WoodCutting OMFG ITS TRUE!
item.dc:creator: @HelpTheNubs HelpTheNubs
item.description:
@HelpTheNubs wrote:

Sorry About That Title Just Had To Get Your Attention…

I am curious on how to set the action of cutting a yew

i have this:

[code]//Mine Tin
if ((objectID == 2094) || (objectID == 2095))
{
//actionAmount++;
if (actionTimer == 0)
{
actionName = “minetin”;
actionTimer = 15;
pEmote = 0x271;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

			}[/code]

And I want To Transfer That To Make it so when you cut a yew you do the woodcutting emote and collect 30k every time you cut it please hook me up with the code to do so or something highly similar.

Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2008, 09:56:40 PM[/size][hr]0mfg 14 views but no one can go into their own client.java and bring out the woodcutting part

Read full topic
